title: Mirai e no Niji: Boku no Ojisan wa, Hansen-byou
original_name: 未来への虹 -僕のおじさんは, ハンセン病-
sinopse: An educational film out leprosy. As of 2009, there are 2,600 people with leprosy in Japan--all of whom are living in sanatoriums and hospitals. The story follows two kids going to visit their uncle who lives in a sanatorium.
